ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: not qute....lv 30, 35, 40, and 45 are barrier levels....which means it takes way longer to get exp in those lv....going from 30 to 31 took almost twice as long
ygData.messageBody:
not qute....lv 30, 35, 40, and 45 are barrier levels....which means it takes way
longer to get exp in those lv....going from 30 to 31 took almost twice as long
as opposed to going from 31 to 32.....even though it will say you gain party exp
or whatever, it doesn't show much because it is a barrier lv

Azor wrote:

> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
> I think what she was saying is it depends on what Lvl the person you're
> casting it on is on. Like since I'm still lvl 15 (should hit Lvl 16
> sometime today), if casted it on me I would not get much exp back but if you
> casted it on a played say that was Lvl 45 they'd get a good bit back.
> So I take it you finally got you one of those Staff of the Observer you've
> been wanting forever. Hope you like it and congrats on Lvl 40. Why is Lvl
> 40 gonna suck by the way? Is it like Lvl 20 when ya die you lose close to a
> bubble of exp? If thats why then I guess on Lvl 40 you what lose close to
> two bubbles of exp?
>
> **************************
> Azor
> Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> **************************
>
> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> > actually, that does make a lot of sense.....it would seem that hte higher
> lv you
> > are, the more exp you can give back.....i just know now that i have to go
> thru
> > hell all over again....lv 40's gonna SUCK majorly......o btw, i have a
> question
> > about the staff of the observer while i'm thinking about it....it has one
> charge
> > of the sentinel spell....<which is a crock ir should be unlimited like the
> > jboots> but is there anyway to recharge it or maybe does it recharge on
> it's own
> > <that was suggested to me by a guildmate> or do i just have to get a new
> staff?
> > which would suck there too....any info would be greatly appreciated on
> this...i
> > love that staff, and the sentinel effect was really kewl and would come in
> handy
> > in places like cazic and lower guk....
> >
> > (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> > lv 40 cleric of The Rathe
